document.full_text: the national weather service warned on monday of the imminent failure of a levee on the black river in southeast missouri, prompting a mandatory evacuation of about 1,000 people in poplar bluff.
document.title: floods force evacuations in ohio valley, missouri
lines_and_colors: the national weather service warned on monday of the imminent failure of a levee on the black river in southeast missouri, prompting a mandatory evacuation of about 1,000 people in poplar bluff.
